monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Avoids Monster encounters - Opens magical vines
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Ancient Nectar
skills.description: Aura: Heal all allied Insects and Ancients by 7% of their own Max Health at the start of every turn. They start combat with Age.

skills.name: Anti Curse
skills.description: Aura: All Debuffs are 20% less effective on Monsters in your party.

skills.name: Auto Restore
skills.description: When attacking, also remove 2 Debuffs from the Monster with the most Debuffs in the party.

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Channeling Sustain
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel also heals your Monsters by 100% of this Monster's Max Mana at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Charged Chant
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster gains a Charge Stack, it has a 5% chance to also gain Sorcery, Barrier or Channel (Buffs).

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Disoriented
skills.description: Unique Aura: Weakness (Debuff) causes enemies affected by it to have a 7.5% chance to miss each hit.

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Link
skills.description: Whenever another Monster in your party is healed, this Monster has a 25% chance to get healed by the same amount.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Lifechannel
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Lifechannel Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Max Mana value.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Potential
skills.description: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Symbiosis
skills.description: Regenerate 5 Mana for each heal received.  (Triggers on any Healing effect)

skills.name: Mass Mana Charging
skills.description: Aura: For every 60 Mana regenerated by this Monster, apply a Charge stack to the whole party.

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Mud Cannon
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Multi Channel
skills.description: Aura: Channel (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Weakness
skills.description: Aura: Weakness (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Mythic
skills.description: Applies Glory, Channel & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Renewal
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever a Debuff or harmful Stack is removed from an ally, also Heal and Shield them by 100.

skills.name: Sap Splatter
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) Heal all for (150 + 60% Magic)

skills.name: Sap Splatter Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 125% (375%) magical damage (earth) Heal all for 2 x (125 + 35% Magic)

skills.name: Sap Splatter Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) magical damage (earth) Heal all for 2 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Slime-ageddon
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison & Weakness (Debuffs)

skills.name: Sonic Wave
skills.description: 2 x 60% (120%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sonic Wave Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 15% chance to apply Weakness (Debuff).

skills.name: Sticky Impact
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Tether. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Stuck Tight
skills.description: Aura: Attacks that target Tethered enemies have 5% increased Critical Chance for each stack of Tether on the enemy.

drops.name: Phoenix Serum
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x 450
